channel.title: Home on A blog on Data
channel.description: Recent content in Home on A blog on Data

item.title: Sentiment Analysis of A Million News Headlines
item.description: I’ve just finished R for Data Science by Hadley Wickham and just started Text mining With R by Julia Silge. So I figured it’s about time i do some data analysis to apply the skills I learned. I decided to do sentiment analysis after reading this post by Julia Silge. After skimming through some interesting datasets on the internet, i decided to use ’A Million Headlines` dataset which can be found on Kaggle.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Akmal Abdul Rashid and i am currently an engineering student at International Islamic University Malaysia (IIUM), majoring in manufacturing. I expects to graduate in january 2018. I built this blog so that it can be a platform for me to practice analyzing data and communicating about it. This blog is built using Hugo with the help of blogdown package in R.
